ValidationRule.description: If the status is set to Sold for a Merchant Services (Payment Processing) Opportunity, the Primary Competition field is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR($RecordType.Name='Payment Processing Opportunity', $RecordType.Name='Payment Processing (DSA) Opportunity'), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Administrator')), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Sold'), ISPICKVAL(Primary_Competition__c, '') , NOT( ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'Referral')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must populate the Primary Competition field before setting the Opportunity Status to Sold.
